review: This place serves great food for a good price and its not super over priced its a great taco place to visit in the market

Every time I come to Toronto, I try to stop in at Seven Lives to get their Gobernador tacos. I was a bit surprised that they have updated some of their menu (e.g., they used to put smoked tuna in these tacos), but they were...

Their tacos are great, a bit pricey - $6 + tax per taco but i will say quality over quantity never goes wrong.
My fav is their grilled chicken one and the fish fillet... they pack a punch of flavour!
They also make some fresh...
Very good but very crowded, long line ups and often certain ingredients are sold out. The seafood options are really good. Never tried the vegetarian but it was very popular.

These tacos were great!! We got the Baja Fish taco, Adobada taco (pork and pineapple), Gobernador (marlin, shrimp and cheese) and the pollo asado (spicy grilled chicken). All four were delicious! The fried fish was was nice and crunchy, all the toppings and meat were...
Yeah I went here to grab a snack and boy the line was hella packed had to wait bout 20 mins before I got served but it was worth it! I love this place
I was excited to see octopus tacos on the menu but was disappointed with the result. The octopus was tough and tortilla was sub-par. Cool little spot but better places to eat elsewhere
Great options, we went with the Baja fish and the spicy shrimp. Long wait but worth it. Milder than expected flavour but still enjoyed it. Would definitely go back.
Great tacos! Fish, Shrimp and Chicken is good. Their guacamole is the Best in town. And their sodas are great too.
Cash only!! Wow. An amazing place with lots of great seafood selection. And the beef and pork were also amazing but the highlight is definitely their seafood array. It's worth the trip.
